wordGroup: dual nationality n. 双重国籍

sentences.en: Asked his nationality, he said American.
sentences.cn: 问到他的国籍，他说是美国人。

sentences.en: All applicants will be considered regardless of age, sex, religion or nationality.
sentences.cn: 所有申请者，不论其年龄、性别、宗教信仰及国籍，都可考虑。

sentences.en: We were both of the same nationality.
sentences.cn: 我们俩是同一国籍的人。
